tennisplusJeAplikacijaKojaPospjeujeProce: Tennis.Plus is an application that improves the process of managing a tennis club, provides support to players through simple court bookings, keeping personal match statistics, automatic ranking of players, reviewing match schedules, creating tennis competitions (tournaments and leagues), publishing news, all for the purpose of increasing user satisfaction.
